reasons_to_visit.details: The Meadows and Princes Street Gardens burst into pink and white blooms.
Hands-on exhibits and evening talks delight curious minds.
Egg hunts in royal parks and services in historic cathedrals.
Comfortable temperatures support long city walks and day trips.

reasons_to_reconsider.details: Brief but frequent rain requires flexible itineraries.
Easter week increases queues at major attractions.
High pollen counts may affect sensitive travelers.

weather.precipitation: Expect light showers followed by sunshine-ideal rainbow conditions.
weather.general_tips: Pack layers and a foldable raincoat; waterproof footwear recommended for park walks.

tourism_level.crowds: Moderate with inflow of spring break visitors.
tourism_level.pricing: Standard hotel rates with slight holiday uplift.
tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Cheerful locals picnic outdoors at the first hint of warmth.

events_holidays.name: Easter Weekend
events_holidays.description: Special services at St Giles' Cathedral and egg hunts in Lauriston Castle gardens.
events_holidays.notes: Book brunches in advance; public transport runs holiday schedules.

unique_experiences.description: Join locals under flowering cherry trees with takeaway treats.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Arrive before noon to secure space and bring reusable cups for coffee.

unique_experiences.description: Interactive illusions and rooftop views-perfect for April showers.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Book timed tickets online; combine with afternoon tea nearby.

unique_experiences.description: Taste small-batch coffee, vegan bakes, and local cheeses.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Bring cash and tote bags; dogs welcome on leads.

unique_experiences.description: Golden hour illuminates the skyline with dramatic shadows.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Take the gentler Radical Road (when open) and carry a head torch for descent.

weather.precipitation: Showers taper off; evenings remain cool.
weather.general_tips: Light jackets and scarves suffice; sunglasses useful for low-setting sun.

tourism_level.crowds: Moderate with many school groups touring historic sites.
tourism_level.overall_atmosphere: Vibrant yet relaxed as festival build-up begins.

events_holidays.name: Beltane Fire Festival prep
events_holidays.description: Volunteers rehearse fiery procession on Calton Hill.
events_holidays.notes: Limited tickets for April 30 performance-book as soon as they release.

unique_experiences.description: Capture reflections of historic mills framed by spring foliage.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Visit early morning or golden hour; respect resident privacy.

unique_experiences.description: Guided walks highlight rare alpine blooms and temperate ferns.
Sample limited releases and learn about Edinburgh's brewing heritage.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Tours run Fridays; book online and arrive via tram to Ocean Terminal.

unique_experiences.description: Calmer seas invite SUP sessions with coastal views.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Wetsuits provided; reschedules offered if winds exceed safe limits.
